item.description:
Wednesday Night Meet & Greet Dance

Dec., 21st. Dinner at 7:30 pm

Dancing at 8:30- 12:30 pm. .

Mickees on the Water
512 Middlesex Tpke
Billerica, Ma.

No Cover Charge, Dj, Cash Bar-Lottery, & Entertainment.

Host: JaniceR9  mailto:janjanr@comcast.net

Co-host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

Steve O. wrote:

     Come on out an join us at anytime. Meet some new people, dance ,and enjoy some food and drink. There will be a Dj, taking our music request. Cause he knows we dance. I will be there for dinner at 7:30 pm. with signs on our tables. So, please join me early. So, I can make sure everyone gets introduced. After 8:30, the Dj starts playing, and everyone is usually on the dance floor. So introductions become difficult that late.
item.how_to_find_us: Look 4 the Meetup signs on our tables

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Wednesday Night Meet & Greet Dance
